testcase.classname: Weather Api Feature file for Positive and Negative Scenarios.
testcase.name: Scenario 1: Validate that attempt to register a weather station without an API key will return response code as 401 and message as Invalid
testcase.system-out: Given I want to Access OpenWeather URL......................................passed When I have registered a station "without" APIKey and following values......passed Then I should receive message body with "cod" as "401"......................passed And I will receive message body with "message" as "Invalid API key. Please see http://openweathermap.org/faq#error401 for more info.".passed

testcase.classname: Weather Api Feature file for Positive and Negative Scenarios.
testcase.name: Validate flow for multiple positive scenarios:
testcase.system-out: When I register a new station to OpenWhetherMap with values of "DEMO_TEST001","Team Demo Test Station 001","33.33","-122.43","222".passed Then I get HTTP response code of "201"......................................passed Then I see response json has values of "DEMO_TEST001","Team Demo Test Station 001","33.33","-122.43","222".passed

testcase.classname: Weather Api Feature file for Positive and Negative Scenarios.
testcase.name: Validate flow for multiple positive scenarios: 2
testcase.system-out: When I register a new station to OpenWhetherMap with values of "DEMO_TEST002","Team Demo Test Station 002","44.44","-122.44","111".passed Then I get HTTP response code of "201"......................................passed Then I see response json has values of "DEMO_TEST002","Team Demo Test Station 002","44.44","-122.44","111".passed
